introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is ようい which you will often hear in contexts like describing tasks, situations, or activities that are not challenging or complex.
meaning_explanation_english: The word ようい means "simple" or "easy" in English. It is used to describe something that is not difficult to do, understand, or achieve. It often conveys a sense of straightforwardness and lack of complexity.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 簡単 : かんたん : simple
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word ようい is かんたん. ようい refers to tasks or situations that are not difficult, whereas かんたん primarily highlights simplicity and ease in performing the task without unnecessary complications. While both can be used interchangeably, かんたん often focuses more on the simplicity factor.
antonyms: 困難 : こんなん : difficulty
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word ようい is こんなん. ようい means something is straightforward and not tough to handle, whereas こんなん emphasizes the difficulties, challenges, or obstacles in a task or situation, making it far from simple or easy.

example_sentences.kanji: その仕事は容易にできる。
example_sentences.furigana: その仕事(しごと)は容易(ようい)にできる。

translations.EN: That work can be done easily.
translations.ID: Pekerjaan itu bisa dilakukan dengan mudah.
translations.ES: Ese trabajo se puede hacer fácilmente.
translations.VI: Công việc đó có thể làm dễ dàng.
translations.FR: Ce travail peut être fait facilement.
translations.ZH: 这项工作可以轻松完成。
translations.KO: 그 일은 쉽게 할 수 있다.
translations.TL: Maaaring gawin nang madali ang trabahong iyon.
translations.MY: အလုပ်နယ်ကို လွယ်ကူစွာ ပြီးစီးနိုင်သည်။
translations.HI: वह काम आसानी से किया जा सकता है।
translations.FA: آن کار به راحتی انجام می‌شود.

example_sentences.kanji: この仕事は容易なそうだ。
example_sentences.furigana: このしごと(しごと)は容易(ようい)なそうだ。

translations.VI: Công việc này có vẻ dễ dàng.
translations.ZH: 这份工作看起来很简单。
translations.TL: Mukhang madali lang ang trabahong ito.
translations.MY: ဒီအလုပ်က လွယ်လွယ်ကူကူလိုက်တာပဲ။
translations.FA: به نظر می رسد این کار آسان است.

example_sentences.kanji: 問題は容易に解決しました。
example_sentences.furigana: 問題(もんだい)は容易(ようい)に解決(かいけつ)しました。

translations.VI: Vấn đề đã được giải quyết dễ dàng.
translations.FR: Le problème a été résolu facilement.
translations.MY: ပြဿနာကို လွယ်ကူစွာ ဖြေရှင်းခဲ့ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: समस्या को सरलता से हल किया गया।

example_sentences.kanji: この本は容易に理解できます。
example_sentences.furigana: この本(ほん)は容易(ようい)に理解(りかい)できます。

translations.EN: This book can be easily understood.
translations.ES: Este libro se puede entender fácilmente.
translations.VI: Cuốn sách này có thể dễ dàng hiểu được.
translations.KO: 이 책은 쉽게 이해할 수 있습니다.
translations.TL: Madaling maintindihan ang aklat na ito.
translations.MY: ဤစာအုပ်ကို လွယ်ကူစွာ နားလည်နိုင်သည်။
translations.HI: यह पुस्तक आसानी से समझी जा सकती है।
translations.FA: این کتاب به راحتی قابل فهم است.
